concept.description: Labels all non-abstract classes extending from junit.framework.TestCase "Test" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:EXTENDS*]->(testCaseType:Type) WHERE testCaseType.fqn = "junit.framework.TestCase" SET c:Test:Junit3 RETURN c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all test methods declared by a test class with "Test" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Class:Test:Junit3)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method) WHERE m.signature =~ "void test.*\\(.*\\)" SET m:Test:Junit3 RETURN m AS Test, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all setUp methods declared by a test class with "SetUp" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Class:Test:Junit3)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method) WHERE m.signature = "void setUp()" SET m:SetUp:Junit3 RETURN m AS SetUpMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all tearDown methods declared by a test class with "TearDown" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Class:Test:Junit3)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method) WHERE m.signature = "void tearDown()" SET m:TearDown:Junit3 RETURN m AS TearDownMethod, c AS TestClass
